title: Wireless Energy Transfer and FD IoT Network Optimization Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Wireless Communication and IoT Systems Knowledge, Intermediate-Level Deep Learning Concepts Mastery
context.additional_context: Practitioner-focused training for implementing reliable communication with multi-antenna robots in automated factory settings

learning_goals: Learners can analyze performance impact factors across residual interference (RSI) models in FD IoT networks
Learners can predict average BLER and throughput of wireless energy transfer systems using deep learning frameworks
Learners can design optimization approaches applying CNN-based models in resource-constrained technical environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
